title: This KDP Niche Is Unpopular, But It Sells All Year Long

tactics.name: low_competition_niche
tactics.description: Identify niches with low search results and high niche scores, leveraging evergreen demand.
steps: Search for specific niches like 'ADHD cleaning planner' to find low competition
Analyze BSR and review counts to validate demand
caveats: Ensure content differentiation to avoid saturation
source_quotes: Total results very, very low at 400... niche score, we see an 82

tactics.name: template_automation
tactics.description: Use pre-made editable templates to streamline planner creation and reduce manual work.
steps: Search Creative Fabrica for KDP-compatible templates
Select Canva-editable templates with relevant content
Customize and export templates for KDP publishing
caveats: Requires commercial rights for template use
source_quotes: You can use pre-made editable templates that do most of the heavy lifting for you.

tactics.name: Canva Template Customization
tactics.description: Modify existing Canva templates to avoid KDP duplication issues by altering fonts, colors, and layout elements.
steps: Replace generic elements with niche-specific visuals (e.g., cleaning supplies)
Adjust fonts, colors, and effects for uniqueness
Rearrange layouts and add custom graphics
source_quotes: You can easily duplicate these pages by just hitting duplicate right there.

tactics.name: template_customization
tactics.description: Modify book templates by adjusting colors, fonts, and layouts to align with a cohesive theme
source_quotes: this is a lot easier than starting from scratch

heuristics.name: boost_low_review_niches
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews is less than 200, then boost the niche
source_quotes: 552 to 828 copies per month... bestsellers rank of 11,284

heuristics.name: year_round_demand
heuristics.condition: If a book maintains consistent sales across seasons with minimal price changes, it indicates year-round demand
source_quotes: This book sells year round. There are moments... but for the most part, you can see this book is going to sell consistently year after year.

heuristics.name: Low-Review Niche Optimization
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize template customization
source_quotes: This KDP niche Is Unpopular, But It Sells All Year Long

heuristics.name: review_based_boost
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews is less than 200, then boost
source_quotes: you don't have to start from scratch

claims.statement: ADHD cleaning planners have 400 Amazon search results with a niche score of 82.
source_quotes: Total results very, very low at 400... niche score, we see an 82

claims.statement: ADHD cleaning planners demonstrate consistent year-round sales despite niche unpopularity
source_quotes: This book sells year round... you can see this book is going to sell consistently year after year.

claims.statement: KDP enforces originality checks for cover and interior content
source_quotes: You don't want to get in trouble with Amazon KDP

claims.statement: The ADHD cleaning planner niche remains consistent year-round due to evergreen demand for organization and cleaning solutions
source_quotes: cleaning and organization never go out of season

niche_patterns.description: Target underserved audiences with specific challenges requiring tailored solutions.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines niche identity with a universal problem, creating demand for specialized tools.
source_quotes: This niche is actually wide open... people need it in January just as much as they need it in July
